quotes.message: I went into Harvard one way and came out a different person... It's the air at Harvard; it's like a Renaissance court.
quotes.name: Erich Segal

quotes.message: There's a rule they don't teach you at the Harvard Business School. It is, if anything is worth doing, it's worth doing to excess.
quotes.name: Edwin H. Land

quotes.message: I am obliged to confess I should sooner live in a society governed by the first two thousand names in the Boston telephone directory than in a society governed by the two thousand faculty members of Harvard University.
quotes.name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.message: I can always tell if someone's from Harvard because they trot out their vitae. I would die at Harvard.
quotes.name: Junot Diaz

quotes.message: If Moses had gone to Harvard Law School and spent three years working on the Hill, he would have written the Ten Commandments with three exceptions and a saving clause.
quotes.name: Charles Morgan

quotes.message: What's a good metaphor for a Harvard student? A talking, gold-plated pile of manure, wearing a fleece.
quotes.name: David Fahrenthold

quotes.message: Harvard was an extraordinary window on the world.
quotes.name: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.message: A Harvard education consists of what you learn at Harvard while you are not studying.
quotes.name: James Bryant Conant

quotes.message: Harvard University, according to the directory of the American Society of Colleges and Universities, is a 'type of weevil.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: I'd say Harvard graduates leave here with a sense of the possible and the limit - and a sense that there are no limits to what humans can do and that you can always be pushing, whatever limit you think might be there.
quotes.name: Drew Gilpin Faust

quotes.message: At Harvard, you don't major. You concentrate.
quotes.name: Gram Parsons

quotes.message: Would physics at Geneva be as good as physics at Harvard? I think not. Rome? I think not. In Britain, I don't think there is one place, neither Cambridge nor Oxford, which can compare with Harvard.
quotes.name: Sheldon Lee Glashow

quotes.message: Four years was enough of Harvard. I still had a lot to learn, but had been given the liberating notion that now I could teach myself.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: I’m not the woman president of Harvard, I’m the president of Harvard.
quotes.name: Drew Gilpin Faust

quotes.message: You are sadly mistaken if you view a Harvard education as primarily a gold-edged certificate to success.
quotes.name: John U. Munro

quotes.message: Harvard makes mistakes too, you know. Kissinger taught there.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Here [at Harvard], if we are doing our job, you will be led to an intellectual abyss.
quotes.name: Raphael Demos

quotes.message: I want to make as much of a contribution as I can, to Harvard, to higher education and hopefully, to education around the world.
quotes.name: Jim Breyer

quotes.message: I know of no title that I deem more honorable than that of Professor of the Harvard Law School.
quotes.name: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.message: At Harvard, people like to impart the idea that you are a mover and shaker.
quotes.name: Alexandra Petri

quotes.message: In truth, I did enjoy the benefits of a Harvard connection.
quotes.name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.message: That said, there are a few clear factors that determine the potential of a university to reach the highest levels of excellence. In the case of Harvard University, it was true that by the time of its tercentenary (300th anniversary of its founding) in 1936, Harvard had already achieved a reputation as a world-class institution. Harvard did not have the stature that it does today.
quotes.name: Henry Rosovsky

quotes.message: I too turned to Webster's Dictionary and it defined Harvard University as a season for gathering crops.
quotes.name: Andy Samberg

quotes.message: I'm an ambitious person, and Harvard makes me feel successful, just having gotten in here. That's the ugly side of why I'm proud of being at Harvard Law School. Another reason is because there's a spirit of serious intellectual endeavor here.
quotes.name: Scott Turow

quotes.message: The Harvard Law states: Under controlled conditions of light, temperature, humidity, and nutrition, the organism will do as it damn well pleases.
quotes.name: Larry Wall

quotes.message: It might be said now that I have the best of both worlds. A Harvard education and a Yale degree.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Harvard is the home of American ideas.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: I picked Harvard because it was in a big city, and a lot of girls' schools were nearby. And I liked President Kennedy, who went to Harvard.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: If you're last in your class at Harvard, it doesn't feel like you're a good student, even though you really are. It's not smart for everyone to want to go to a great school.
quotes.name: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.message: I teach at Harvard that the world and the heavens, and the stars are all real, but not so damned real, you see.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: A rich poet from Harvard has no sense in his mind, except the aesthetic.
quotes.name: Beatrice Wood

quotes.message: We’ve all started lifelong friendships here, and some of us even families. That’s why I’m so grateful to this place. Thanks, Harvard.
quotes.name: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.message: Not even a Harvard School of Business can make greed into a science.
quotes.name: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.message: Part of being a big winner is the ability to be a big loser. There is no paradox involved. It is a distinctly Harvard thing to be able to turn any defeat into victory.
quotes.name: Erich Segal

quotes.message: Every Harvard class should have one Democrat to rescue it from oblivion
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Harvard produces leaders. People with Harvard degrees go on to become administrators in high-level positions in state educational departments and in public schools around the country.
quotes.name: Christina Hoff Sommers

quotes.message: Harvard was a kind of luxurious afternoon.
quotes.name: Lincoln Kirstein

quotes.message: The truth of the matter is, you die, all you do is die, and yet you live, yes you live, and that's no Harvard lie.
quotes.name: Jack Kerouac

quotes.message: The only thing I ever learned was that some people are lucky and other people aren't and not even a graduate of the Harvard Business School can say why.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: I don't believe I'll ever get credit for anything I do in foreign affairs, no matter how successful it is, because I didn't go to Harvard.
quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: We're doomed to repeat the past no matter what. That's what it is to be alive. It's pretty dense kids who haven't figured that out by the time they're ten.... Most kids can't afford to go to Harvard and be misinformed.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: If I am not elected, I imagine that I will ask Harvard to let me back.
quotes.name: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.message: Harvard has now de facto become a Chinese outpost.
quotes.name: Thorsten J. Pattberg

quotes.message: A whale ship was my Yale College and my Harvard.
quotes.name: Herman Melville
